Classes in com.amazon.ags.api used by com.amazon.ags.api
AGHandleStatus
          Enumeration of statuses for an AGResponseHandle.
AGResponseCallback
          Callback interface to communicate status for requests made to the AmazonGames service.
AmazonGames
          The top level client for all Amazon Games functionality.
AmazonGamesCallback
          Callback interface to handle all asynchronous responses from the Amazon Games.
AmazonGamesClient
          This is the single entry point to access the Amazon Games Client.
AmazonGamesFeature
          Enumeration of features Amazon Games provides.
AmazonGamesStatus
          Status representing the state of the Amazon Games Client.
ErrorCode
          Common error conditions that may occur across Amazon Games Service
RequestResponse
          RequestResponse make up the AmazonGamesEvents Queue Base class for all AmazonGames asset RequestResponses Can handle these by checking the event type and then casting
